ai-iti83:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti83:2.1_0: “Mendicants, when a god is due to pass away from the realm of the gods, five warning signs appear.
ai-iti83:2.2_0: Their flower-garlands wither; their clothes become soiled; they sweat from the armpits; their physical appearance deteriorates; and they no longer delight in their heavenly throne.
ai-iti83:2.3_0: When the other gods know that that god is due to pass away, they wish them well in three ways:
ai-iti83:2.4_0: ‘Sir, may you go from here to a good place!
ai-iti83:3.1_0: When you have gone to a good place, may you be blessed with good fortune!
ai-iti83:4.1_0: When you have been blessed with good fortune, may you become well grounded!’
ai-iti83:5.1_0: When this was said, one of the mendicants asked the Buddha,
ai-iti83:5.2_0: “Sir, what do the gods reckon to be going to a good place?
ai-iti83:6.1_0: What do they reckon to be blessed with good fortune?
ai-iti83:7.1_0: What do they reckon to become well grounded?”
ai-iti83:8.1_0: “It is human existence, mendicant, that the gods reckon to be going to a good place.
ai-iti83:9.1_0: When a human being gains faith in the teaching and training proclaimed by the Realized One,
ai-iti83:9.2_0: that is what the gods reckon to be blessed with good fortune.
ai-iti83:10.1_0: When that faith in the Realized One is settled, rooted, and planted deep; when it’s strong and can’t be shifted by any ascetic or brahmin or god or Māra or Brahmā or by anyone in the world,
ai-iti83:10.2_0: that is what the gods reckon to become well grounded.”
ai-iti83:12.2_0: a god passes from the realm of the gods,
ai-iti83:13.1_0: ‘Sir, go from here to a good place,
ai-iti83:13.3_0: As a human being, gain supreme faith
ai-iti83:14.1_0: May that faith of yours be settled,
ai-iti83:14.4_0: in the true teaching so well proclaimed.
ai-iti83:17.1_0: then, having made much worldly merit
ai-iti83:17.4_0: in the true teaching, the spiritual life.’
ai-iti83:18.1_0: It is due to such compassion
ai-iti83:18.2_0: when it comes to the gods,
ai-iti83:18.3_0: is due to pass away, they wish them well:
ai-iti83:19.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
